    @allure.title("Validate the audit logs details for updating Nitrosamine limit policy")
    @allure.description("This test case test API to validate the updating Nitrosamine limit policy")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cvttem5")
    @pytest.mark.update_nitrosamine_limit_policy_validate_audit_logs_details
    def test_update_nitrosamine_limit_policy_validate_audit_logs_details(self):
        data = {}
        data.update(const.DEFAULT_SURFACE_AREA_SQCM)
        self.update_default_unit.test_update_default_unit(data)
    
        time_stamp = None
        global_recovery_percentage = Excel.read_excel_col_name_row_number(const.get_master_data(),
                                                                          "config",
                                                                          "global_recovery_percentage",
                                                                          2)
        upper_limit = Excel.read_excel_col_name_row_number(const.get_master_data(),
                                                           "config", "upper_limit", 2)
    
        policy_data = {"salMassUnit": "ug", "globalRecoveryPercentage": global_recovery_percentage,
                       "useGlobalRecoveryPercentage": True, "useResidueLimit": True, "residueLimit": upper_limit,
                       "residue_unit": "ug/sqcm", "useSwabPerSampleLimit": False, "useRinsePerSampleLimit": False,
                       "rinseSampleUnit": "ppm", "swabSampleUnit": "ppm", "useSampleLimit": True,
                       "rinseSampleLimit": "11", "swabSampleLimit": "12"}
        get_policy = json.loads(self.update_nitrosamine.test_get_nitrosamine_cleaning_limit_policy())
        get_policy = get_policy["policy"]
        update_policy = create_cleaning_limit_policy_nitrosamine_payload(get_policy, policy_data)
        data.update({"update_policy_payload": update_policy})
        if get_policy != update_policy["data"]:
            time_stamp = self.update_nitrosamine.test_update_nitrosamine_limit_policy(data)["timestamp"]
    
        audit_logs_details = self.validate_audit_logs.audit_logs_details()
    
        for index, result in enumerate(audit_logs_details.get("audit_logs", {}).get("result", [])):
            response_time_stamp = result.get("timestamp")
            time_stamp = str(time_stamp)
            action_exists = result.get("action") is not None
            domain_is_default_unit = result.get("domain") == "CleaningPolicy"
    
            audit_diff = result.get("diff", {})
    
            if audit_diff.get(self.nitrosamine_upper_limits) is not None and action_exists and domain_is_default_unit:
                self.validate_audit_logs.assert_audit_diff(audit_diff, self.sal_mass_unit, const.SAL_MASS_UNIT_MG,
                                                           const.SAL_MASS_UNIT_UG)
>               self.validate_audit_logs.assert_audit_diff(audit_diff, self.global_recovery, const.NOT_INCLUDED,
                                                           str(global_recovery_percentage))
